title: Can Rajasthan and Gujarat become powerhouses of renewable energy?
description: India is making significant strides in renewable energy, with Rajasthan and Gujarat leading the way. Rajasthan excels in solar power, while Gujarat balances both wind and solar projects. These efforts are positioning India as a global contender in sustainable energy, contributing to economic growth and climate change mitigation.
